page.title: 02LITTLE WITLEY LIFE - CLUB
page.content: We may be unique; we have a church but no pub.{Our hall}is the centre of the parish geographically and socially.The hall consists of a timber framed and cladded single storey three roomed building supported in one corner by a car jack.The halls Diamond Jubilee was celebrated with a family barbeque and Dutch marching band jazz concert attended by over 150 locals. The{management committee}of 11 local residents (two each appointed by the parish council, Womens Institute and church Friends,the rest elected) are refurbishing the bar, which will be the envy of any publican. {Social Club night}is every Thursday; other functions and bookings include Barn dances,casinos,Women's Institute, Parish Council meetings,suppers,fabric sales,caravan rallies,polling station jazz concerts and private parties.
